property.name: IsStopped
property.description-key: Whether the animation is stopped or not

property.name: IsPaused
property.description-key: Whether the animation is paused or not

property.name: StopAnimationToken
property.description-key: In case you want to stop the animation, this is the GUID used to start the animation

property.name: PauseAnimationToken
property.description-key: In case you want to pause the animation, this is the GUID used to start the animation

property.name: Loop
property.description-key: Whether the animation should loop when it reaches the last frame

property.name: AutoPlay
property.description-key: Whether the animation should automatically play or not

property.name: StartEndFrame
property.description-key: The initial and the end frame to be played. I.e.: 0,24

property.name: Speed
property.description-key: Sets the animation speed in ms
